content:
Today I chose issue #23905 for discussion!

linter.countHeartbeats is broken
Created by @Kevin Buzzard (@kbuzzard) on 2025-04-10
Labels:

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
Not only is it still relevant, but count_heartbeats in is currently also broken :-)

Actually, looking at it, maybe count_heartbeats without in is currently fixed? no, on e.g. JacobiZariski it's still reporting that everything in e.g. a section takes the same number of heartbeats. So currently it's doubly broken :-(
